item.description:
The Socialist Party will meet at 5:30 pm on Sunday, 18 July 2010 in the Lucy Parsons Center. Hear reports back from the US Social Forum and SP National Committee meeting in Detroit. Get the latest updates on the United National Antiwar Conference in Albany, and the Socialist Party's own National Organizing Conference to be held August 14 and 15 in Madison, Wisconsin. For more information, check out the preliminary agenda here: http://www.spboston.o...

Members, supporters, and the curious are all invited to attend.

The Lucy Parsons Center is located at 549 Columbus Ave. in the South End, near the Mass Ave. T stop on the Orange Line, the Symphony T stop on the Green Line (E), and the #1 bus line.

See you there!
item.name: Local Business Meeting
